RESOLVED_ENTITIES.United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo B: United States Border Patrol Agent Hugo Benavides

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducted vehicle inspections at the Freer immigration checkpoint, processed undocumented individuals, and noticed drop-offs on Farm-to-Market Road 2050; agents use routes to avoid checkpoints; monitored traffic on Farm-to-Market Road 2050 which mostly consists of ranchers, oil trucks, and occasional small cars from a nearby wind farm; stopped a white Malibu sedan transporting illegals; involved in the traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.U.S. Highway 59: highway where vehicles were inspected by United States Border Patrol and location of Freer immigration checkpoint; location of the traffic stop

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Hebbronville Checkpoint: checkpoint on U.S. Highway 359 avoided by smugglers; mentioned by Defendant as the starting point of his travel

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Officer Reymundo Reyes: conducted a traffic stop of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and wrote a ticket; cooperated with United States Border Patrol during the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Dallas, Texas: city mentioned as the destination of IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s travel plans
